mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id , u.cat_level , u.xp_total , l.xp_required AS current_level_total_xp , l2.xp_required AS next_level_total_xp , LEAST(COALESCE(ROUND((u.xp_total * 100.0 / NULLIF(l.xp_required, 0)), 0), 0), 100) AS progress_percent , b.total_points FROM tb_user_cat u JOIN tb_cat_level l ON u.cat_level = l.cat_level LEFT JOIN tb_cat_level l2 ON u.cat_level + 1 = l2.cat_level LEFT JOIN tb_user_total_points b ON u.user_id = b.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id};
